inputs.name: rootDirectory
inputs.label: Root directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Base directory for searching files. If not specified the default working directory will be used.

inputs.name: targetFiles
inputs.label: Target files
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Absolute or relative comma or newline-separated paths to the files to replace tokens. Wildcards can be used.
Eg: `**/*.config` for all config files in all sub folders.

inputs.name: encoding
inputs.label: Files encoding
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the files encoding.
The 'auto' value will determine the encoding based on the Byte Order Mark (BOM) if present; otherwise it will use ascii.

inputs.name: writeBOM
inputs.label: Write unicode BOM
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked writes an unicode Byte Order Mark (BOM).
inputs.visibleRule: encoding != ascii && encoding != win1252 && encoding != iso88591

inputs.name: verbosity
inputs.label: Verbosity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the logs verbosity level. (error and system debug are always on)

inputs.name: actionOnMissing
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the action on a missing variable.

inputs.name: keepToken
inputs.label: Keep token
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked tokens with missing variables will not be replaced by empty string.

inputs.name: tokenPrefix
inputs.label: Token prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: The prefix of the tokens to search in the target files.

inputs.name: tokenSuffix
inputs.label: Token suffix
inputs.helpMarkDown: The suffix of the tokens to search in the target files.

inputs.name: emptyValue
inputs.label: Empty value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The variable value which will be replaced by an empty string.

inputs.name: escapeType
inputs.label: Escape values type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify how to escape variable values.

inputs.name: escapeChar
inputs.label: Escape character
inputs.helpMarkDown: The escape character to use when escaping characters in the variable values.

inputs.name: charsToEscape
inputs.label: Characters to escape
inputs.helpMarkDown: Characters in variable values to escape before replacing tokens.
